name: Crazy Sister(0.0.5)
description:
Crazy Sister is a test horror game where you just run for your sister with an axe she is crazy

UPDATE 0.0.5: flash light, sister got now a slash hammer, bones removed, fixes, :  )

check every day if there is a update like in the Description update then delete the old one and install the game again then you have an updated version have fun  :  )
